### Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal - HVAC Maintenance Services Contract

### Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to provide heating, ventilation, air conditioning (HVAC), commercial refrigeration, and boiler equipment maintenance services at the Connaught Range, located in Ottawa, Ontario.

### Key Details
- **Title**: Request for Proposal (RFP) - HVAC Maintenance Services Contract
- **Tender Reference Number**: WS3864736193-Doc3969423217
- **Closing Date**: May 24, 2023, 14:00 EDT
- **Contract Start Date**: May 1, 2023
- **Contract End Date**: (No specified end date)

### Brief Description
The contractor will be responsible for providing maintenance services, including all necessary tools, services, materials, travel, and labor on equipment in accordance with the Statement of Work. The scope includes:
- Heating and cooling systems
- Ventilation systems
- Air conditioning systems
- Commercial refrigeration equipment
- Boiler equipment

### Security Requirements
There are security requirements associated with this solicitation. Only pre-qualified bidders will be invited to bid. Security requirements and procedures must be adhered to.

### Mandatory Site Visit
A mandatory site visit will be held on May 3rd, 2023, at 10:00 AM EDT, at the Connaught Range, Shirley Blvd., Ottawa, ON. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than April 26, 2023, at 14:00 EST to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) and date of birth(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

### Requirements Submission
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted in accordance with the instructions provided in this RFP. Failure to comply may result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
